BasicInfo.short: The Content Marketing Engagement Platform for Publishers Big and Small

Products.name: Game Cloud Portals
Products.description: Game Cloud Portal is a gaming hub that integrates with Game Cloud Competition and instantly creates an interactive community on your site.

Products.name: Game Cloud Community
Products.description: Allow meaningful engagements on your site and create a destination, allowing you to build a community and brand affinity.

Products.name: Game Cloud Conversion
Products.description: Game Cloud Conversion provides a funnel that collects leads and the information needed to convert a prospect into a customer.

Products.name: Game Cloud Competition
Products.description: Game Cloud Competition creates an environment that captivates users and their friends using milestones, progress, recognition and rewards.

Products.name: Content Hubs
Products.description: Game Cloud Content Hubs are the easiest way to build a ideal interactive experience while keeping it loaded with fresh content.

Products.name: Game Cloud Quizzes and Polls
Products.description: Game Cloud Quizzes and Polls are powerful tools to increase time on site and learn what your audience thinks.
